mapper.select: SELECT an.id, an.groupId, an.albumName, an.type, an.creator, an.createTime, cf.filePath FROM album_name an LEFT JOIN common_file cf ON an.groupId = #{groupId} and an.id = cf.rId and cf.createTime = (SELECT max(createTime) FROM common_file cf2 WHERE rId = cf.rId and type = 1 and isDelete = 0) ORDER BY an.createTime;
